QueryDefinition.Query:
with careSite as ( SELECT distinct pracid as id FROM {sc}.Practice )
select staffid as PROVIDER_ID, cs.id as CARE_SITE_ID, cast(staffid as varchar(20)) as PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, l.text as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE, cast(coalesce(role, 0) as varchar(5)) as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_KEY, coalesce(gender, 0) as gender, case when coalesce(gender, 0) = 1 then 8507 when coalesce(gender, 0) = 2 then 8532 else 0 end as gender_concept_id from {sc}.Staff s JOIN {sc}.lookup l ON s.role = l.code AND lookup_type_id = 76 LEFT JOIN careSite cs ON cs.id = cast(Right(cast(staffid as varchar(20)), 5) as int)
